Posts.Content: Warrior_mom wrote: I just found out about gcMAF treatments from Japan. Has anyone else heard or tried this?? So far all I can really find about it is from ThegcMAFbook.com and the website HYPERLINK "www.saisei-mirai.or.jp">www.saisei-mirai.or.jp">http://www.saisei-mirai.or.jp" www.saisei-mirai.or.jp Any information would be great! Dx 3/30/2016, IDC, Left, 5cm, Stage IV, metastasized to bone/liver, Grade 3, ER+/PR+, HER2- Targeted Therapy Ibrance (palbociclib) Hormonal Therapy Femara (letrozole), Zoladex (goserelin) Log in to post a reply
